items.sentence: Why didn\'t you let me know you were in Boston?
Why didn\'t you tell me that you could do that?
It\'s become very hard for me to walk very far.
It\'s hard to believe that Tom is still single.
Tom must have spent a fortune on his new house.
Tom needs to be told not to do that by himself.
Tom needs to take a long, hard look at himself.
Tom needs to tell Mary what he wants her to do.
Tom never told his children that he loved them.
I\'m afraid we\'re going to be late for school.
